item.title: About
item.description: Thanks for dropping by. This is my journey in brief: If you like to get in touch, I would love to hear from you and am excited to read your message. Just say hi or give feedback of any kind. Here is a selection of previously completed projects: Sustainable finance trending topics radar: towardssustainablefinance.com Sustainable finance: Predicting firms' ESG scores with Google trends (Github) Built a job recommender systems for the Danish workforce (1.
